-- | Run Nero server applications with Warp
--   
--   Check the <a>README</a> for a more detailed explanation.
@package nero-warp
@version 0.3

module Nero.Warp

-- | Run a <tt>Nero</tt> <a>Application</a> with <tt>Warp</tt> on the given
--   port.
serve :: Server a => Port -> a -> IO ()
